text: With a , w , s , d you can control the drone, each race is finished after 2 Rounds
Your Drone Model C1s23d34da has three gadgets. The first one is Rockets you can fire them with ouse cklic , but you need to wait until your charge is filed up to half
The second one is a boost it will be activated with shift ,because your model isn't the newest one you cant control it while the boost is active and if you stand still it won't work
The last one is a shield please use it with the , AND DON'T DESTROY MY DRONE
This my special Drone Steve ,it has no shields and Rockets but its much faster, so please don?t use Rockets against it
